xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="(//DatastoreSummary/accessible[text()="true"])[1]"> <new-element> <xsl:value-of select="../name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </new-element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: <items> <item> <parameters> <virtual-machine>tso_auto_vm2</virtual-machine> <spec> <device-change-list> <device-change> <device> <!-- either of <disk-name> and <disk-key> is required. If both are provided, <disk-key> is honoured and <disk-name> is ignored. --> <disk-name></disk-name> <disk-key>
